title: UK Urban Air Quality Monitoring Network 2020-2024
abstract: Hourly measurements of PM2.5, PM10, NO2, O3, and SO2 from 150 monitoring stations across UK urban areas. Data includes meteorological context and health advisory indices.
lineage: Collected by DEFRA Air Quality monitoring network

title: UK Soil Organic Carbon Stock Assessment 2022
abstract: National assessment of soil organic carbon stocks at 1km resolution across England, Wales, and Scotland. Includes depth profiles to 1 meter and land use classification.
lineage: Derived from Countryside Survey and UKCEH soil sampling

title: UK Flood Risk Assessment Maps 2021
abstract: Probabilistic flood risk maps for fluvial and coastal flooding across the UK. Includes 1-in-100 and 1-in-1000 year return period scenarios.

title: National Forest Inventory Great Britain 2020
abstract: Comprehensive woodland cover map and statistics for Great Britain including species composition, age structure, and management status.

title: UK Marine Protected Areas Monitoring Data 2019-2023
abstract: Ecological monitoring data from 50 Marine Conservation Zones including species counts, habitat assessments, and water quality measurements.
